_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

AwardedNotification.description: The document used to communicate a contract award to the winner.

AwardedNotification.title: Awarded Notification. Details
AwardedNotification.description: The document used to communicate a contract award to the winner.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Awarded Notification. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Awarded Notification. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Awarded Notification. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Awarded Notification. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Awarded Notification. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Awarded Notification. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Awarded Notification. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

ContractFolderID.title: Awarded Notification. Contract Folder Identifier. Identifier
ContractFolderID.description: An identifier, assigned by the sender, for the process file (i.e., record) to which this document belongs.

IssueDate.title: Awarded Notification. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Awarded Notification. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

ContractName.title: Awarded Notification. Contract Name. Name
ContractName.description: The name, expressed as text, of this procurement project.

Note.title: Awarded Notification. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

MinutesDocumentReference.title: Awarded Notification. Minutes_ Document Reference. Document Reference
MinutesDocumentReference.description: A reference to a set of minutes associated with this award.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Awarded Notification. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

TenderResult.title: Awarded Notification. Tender Result
TenderResult.description: The result of the tendering process reported in this notification.

FinalFinancialGuarantee.title: Awarded Notification. Final_ Financial Guarantee. Financial Guarantee
FinalFinancialGuarantee.description: A bond guarantee by the submitter of a tender or bid, required of the tender winner.

Signature.title: Awarded Notification. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
